post.body: it has been winter for at least 2 months! lol
can't decide whether to keep my ticket stub from yesterday's Lion's game, or cash it in for a free donut. cuz, donuts are delicious.
weekend in detroit starts now.
I love the airline Nic is flying tonight: TrannyAir. (ok, "AirTran")
Snowblower karma has paid off tenfold today. Thank you! Cookies for everyone!
prefers to keep red car shiny side up. in the garage.
just occurred to me that the fordz "jeans-day-everyday-until-end-of-year" morale-booster campaign ends soon. i don't wanna wear fancy pants.
loves a good winter storm-tastrophe: http://tinyurl.com/3klgle. it's almost as though it is winter around here.
damn! not enough snow to justify snowblower use, just enough to slow my morning down. thank goodness for the child labor option.
All summer long, my beloved Yak Trax sat right >>there<< on the shelf in the garage. Wherefore art thou in this time of greatest need? :-(
is solar-powered and needs some warm sun.
is not fond of the icy breeze that is breezing through my house. what the heck.
Dad, it's "Depeche Mode" not "Day-peach-eh" (played music Scene It: how he, of all people, won, is a mystery to me).
would like to know why GARMIN shows no love for the mac users. why you got to be like that?
is cleaning, restructuring, rethinking.
ditched the kid, now for the wrapping of presents :-)
loves a freshly-brewed catastrophe. :-|
to the gym we go... i hope my legs remember how to run.
best gift request ever: "design me a tattoo of a skull, tragic quotation, & make it look like it's emerging from flesh. that or a chia pet."
has achieved a new level of tired. when i'm not so tired, i'll think of a name for it.
